title: Bydgoszcz
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Bydgoszcz, from a wide variety of genres like Funk, News, RnB, Soul and Sports.  Enjoy stations such as Polskie Radio PiK, Orange Park Radio and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radios.title: Polskie Radio PiK
radios.profile_slogan: Rozgłośnia Regionalna Polskiego Radia na Pomorzu i Kujawach

radio_info.short: Polish Radio Pik combines tradition Pomeranian Polish Radio, which began its mission in ether in Torun in 1935 and launched in 1945, the Polish Radio
radio_info.rest: in Bydgoszcz. After the war, gave radio station in the structures of the Committee for Radio and Television, being a kind of field division of the Polish Radio in Warsaw.

radio_info.short: The Orange Park Radio is an Internet Radio station broadcasting from Germany, providing Funk, R'n'B, Hits USA, Pop and Rock Music.
